Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    This class part of my Star trek adventure game the game is a very simple, text based adventure game with a graphical representation The game has been extended from "SoC World" to be made more interesting! A "Item" represents one thing game. A thing apear on the map and can be picked up or used
    Version:
    Final
    Author:
    UP730691
